paragraphs: #electricriver — next genegation full service digital agency with focus on social media. We based in Moscow (Russia). We create social media products and services that help brands always impress their audience and to be on the top of our digital and social media world.

#electricriver — is a professional team that brings together producers, creators, community managers, copywriters, developers, strategists and analysts to create the best projects for social media and digital market.
Our mission: make awesome interactive activations, give a quality service to our clients, and just be good people.
